evidence.source_document: Plaintiffs' Motion for a Preliminary Injunction
evidence.text: Plaintiffs American Public Health Association (“APHA”), Ibis Reproductive Health, International Union, United Automobile, Aerospace, and Agricultural Implement Workers (“UAW”), Brittany Charlton, Katie Edwards, Peter Lurie, and Nicole Maphis (“Plaintiffs”) respectfully move for a preliminary injunction enjoining Defendants from implementing the unlawful directives referred to collectively as the “Directives,” as defined in the proposed order attached as Exhibit A to this motion.

extracted.value: Plaintiffs filed a motion for a preliminary injunction on April 25, 2025, seeking to enjoin Defendants from implementing unlawful directives that terminate grants and suspend review processes in violation of the APA and Constitution.

evidence.text: MOTION to Seal by American Public Health Association, Ibis Reproductive Health, United Auto Workers, Brittany Charlton, Katie Edwards, Peter Lurie, Nicole Maphis.

extracted.value: Plaintiffs filed a motion to seal on April 23, 2025, seeking to protect certain organizational declarants' sensitive information from public disclosure.

evidence.text: MOTION for Protective Order Regarding Certain Organizational Declarants by American Public Health Association, Ibis Reproductive Health, United Auto Workers, Brittany Charlton, Katie Edwards, Peter Lurie, Nicole Maphis.

extracted.value: Plaintiffs filed a motion for protective order on April 25, 2025, requesting confidentiality for certain organizational declarants in the case.

evidence.text: Assented to MOTION for Protective Order and Joint Motion for Briefing Schedule by Brittany Charlton, Katie Edwards, American Public Health Association, Peter Lurie, Nicole Maphis, Ibis Reproductive Health, United Auto Workers.

extracted.value: Plaintiffs filed a Joint Motion for Briefing Schedule on May 2, 2025, requesting a briefing schedule for the pending motions including the preliminary injunction and protective order.

evidence.text: MOTION to Dismiss for lack of jurisdiction and failure to state a claim by Jay Bhattacharya, Robert F. Kennedy, Jr., National Institutes of Health, United States Department of Health and Human Services.

extracted.value: Defendants filed a motion to dismiss on June 20, 2025, seeking dismissal of the case for lack of jurisdiction and failure to state a claim.

evidence.text: MOTION Complete the Administrative Record by Brittany Charlton, Katie Edwards, American Public Health Association, Peter Lurie, Nicole Maphis, Ibis Reproductive Health, United Auto Workers.

extracted.value: Plaintiffs filed a motion to complete the administrative record on June 9, 2025, requesting the court to order defendants to produce additional administrative records relevant to the case.

evidence.text: MOTION to Seal Lists of Grant Terminations by Brittany Charlton, Katie Edwards, American Public Health Association, Peter Lurie, Nicole Maphis, Ibis Reproductive Health, United Auto Workers.

extracted.value: Plaintiffs filed a motion to seal lists of grant terminations on June 18, 2025, seeking confidentiality for sensitive grant termination data.
